verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> to them, <WH376> 'When a man makes <WH6381> a vow, <WH5088> the persons <WH5315> shall be for Yahweh <WH3068> by your valuation. <WH6187>

If the person is from five <WH2568> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> even to twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> then your valuation <WH6187> shall be for a male <WH2145> twenty <WH6242> shekels, <WH8255> and for a female <WH5347> ten <WH6235> shekels. <WH8255>

If the person is from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> even to five <WH2568> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> then your valuation <WH6187> shall be for a male <WH2145> five <WH2568> shekels <WH8255> of silver, <WH3701> and for a female <WH5347> your valuation <WH6187> shall be three <WH7969> shekels <WH8255> of silver. <WH3701>

If the person is from sixty <WH8346> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward; <WH4605> if it is a male, <WH2145> then your valuation <WH6187> shall be fifteen <WH2568> shekels, <WH8255> and for a female <WH5347> ten <WH6235> shekels. <WH8255>

But if he is poorer <WH4134> than your valuation, <WH6187> then he shall be set <WH5975> before <WH6440> the priest, <WH3548> and the priest <WH3548> shall value <WH6186> him; <WH6310> according to the ability <WH3027> of him who vowed <WH5087> shall the priest <WH3548> value him. <WH6186>
<WH929>"'If it is an animal, of which men offer <WH7126> an offering <WH7133> to Yahweh, <WH3068> all that any man gives <WH5414> of such to Yahweh <WH3068> becomes holy. <WH6944>

He shall not alter <WH2498> it, <WH4171> nor change it, <WH2896> a good for a bad, <WH7451> or a bad <WH7451> for a good: <WH2896> and if he shall at all <WH4171> change <WH4171> animal <WH929> for animal, <WH929> then both it and that for which it is changed <WH8545> shall be holy. <WH6944>

and the priest <WH3548> shall value <WH6186> it, <WH996> whether it is good <WH2896> or <WH996> bad. <WH7451> As you the priest <WH3548> values it, <WH6187> so shall it be.
But if he will indeed <WH1350> redeem <WH1350> it, <WH3254> then he shall add the fifth <WH2549> part of it to its valuation. <WH6187>

<WH376>"'When a man dedicates <WH6942> his house <WH1004> to be holy <WH6944> to Yahweh, <WH3068> then the priest <WH3548> shall evaluate <WH6186> it, <WH2896> whether it is good or bad: <WH7451> as the priest <WH3548> shall evaluate <WH6186> it, <WH6965> so shall it stand.

<WH376>"'If a man dedicates <WH6942> to Yahweh <WH3068> part of the field <WH7704> of his possession, <WH272> then your valuation <WH6187> shall be according <WH6310> to the seed <WH2233> for it: <WH2233> the sowing of a homer <WH2563> of barley <WH8184> shall be valued at fifty <WH2572> shekels <WH8255> of silver. <WH3701>

But if he dedicates <WH6942> his field <WH7704> after <WH310> the Jubilee, <WH3104> then the priest <WH3548> shall reckon <WH2803> to him the money <WH3701> according to <WH6310> the years <WH8141> that remain <WH3498> to the Year <WH8141> of Jubilee; <WH3104> and an abatement <WH1639> shall be made from your valuation. <WH6187>

If he who dedicated <WH6942> the field <WH7704> will indeed <WH1350> redeem <WH1350> it, <WH3254> then he shall add the fifth <WH2549> part of the money <WH3701> of your valuation <WH6187> to it, <WH6965> and it shall remain his.
If he will not redeem <WH1350> the field, <WH7704> or if he has sold <WH4376> the field <WH7704> to another <WH312> man, <WH376> it shall not be redeemed any more; <WH1350>

but the field, <WH7704> when it goes out <WH3318> in the Jubilee, <WH3104> shall be holy <WH6944> to Yahweh, <WH3068> as a field <WH7704> devoted; <WH2764> it shall be owned <WH272> by the priests. <WH3548>
<WH6942>"'If he dedicates to Yahweh <WH3068> a field <WH7704> which he has bought, <WH4736> which is not of the field <WH7704> of his possession, <WH272>

then the priest <WH3548> shall reckon <WH2803> to him the worth <WH4373> of your valuation <WH6187> up to the Year <WH8141> of Jubilee; <WH3104> and he shall give <WH5414> your valuation <WH6187> on that day, <WH3117> as a holy thing <WH6944> to Yahweh. <WH3068>
In the Year <WH8141> of Jubilee <WH3104> the field <WH7704> shall return <WH7725> to him from whom it was bought, <WH7069> even to him to whom the possession <WH272> of the land belongs. <WH776>

<WH1060>"'Only the firstborn among animals, <WH929> which is made a firstborn <WH1069> to Yahweh, <WH3068> no man <WH376> may dedicate <WH6942> it; <WH7794> whether an ox or sheep, <WH7716> it is Yahweh <WH3068>'s.

<WH2764>"'Notwithstanding, no devoted thing, that a man <WH376> shall devote <WH2763> to Yahweh <WH3068> of all that he has, <WH120> whether of man or animal, <WH929> or of the field <WH7704> of his possession, <WH272> shall be sold <WH4376> or redeemed: <WH1350> every devoted thing <WH2764> is most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> to Yahweh. <WH3068>
<WH2764>"'No one devoted, who shall be <WH3808> devoted <WH2764> from among men, <WH120> shall be ransomed; <WH6299> he shall surely <WH4191> be put to death. <WH4191>

<WH4643>"'All the tithe of the land, <WH776> whether of the seed <WH2233> of the land <WH776> or of the fruit <WH6529> of the trees, <WH6086> is Yahweh <WH3068>'s. It is holy <WH6944> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

He shall not search <WH1239> whether it is good <WH2896> or bad, <WH7451> neither shall he change <WH4171> it: <WH4171> and if he changes it at all, <WH4171> then both it and that for which it is changed <WH8545> shall be holy. <WH6944> It shall not be redeemed. <WH1350>'"
These are the commandments <WH4687> which Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> for the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> on Mount <WH2022> Sinai. <WH5514>
